name: Tetris: HEROES
description:
Teris HEROES!

Despite being very little about tetris, this is a platformer where tetris pieces fall from the sky, and you gotta hit the enemy at the top.

Use WASD to move, space to slow down time, and click to boost in the direction the arrow is pointing. Beat each Heroes' level to unlock the final boss. All music and sound effects made by me.
